Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 9330
Reviews.Author: Marissa H.
Reviews.Content: Product is as described. Satisfied with purchase. Not many people are interested in non-touchscreen phones these days, especially Blackberry, and even more so older models. But the device is a good phone, I've had it in the past, and it's meeting my expectations thus far.

Reviews.Title: I loved it
Reviews.Author: carissa
Reviews.Content: I loved everything about this phone accept that I needed a Verizon phone and this is a sprint phone. That was my mistake. The seller was awesome and the phone was perfect... except for the whole carrier issue.

Reviews.Title: Received Sprint 8530 (Purple) appears exactly the same!
Reviews.Author: A. Garg "dad FACE"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Blackberry CDMA Sprint phone as an upgrade from the 8530 for my daughter's birthday. It was sold from a 3rd party vendor, but fulfilled by Amazon.  The only differnce between the two phones is the amount of RAM.  The 8530 cannot effectively use any OS > ver. 5, while the 9330 with 512 MB onboard memory can use the better BB OS 6.0.The two phones appear identical: it was not until I turned the phone on, and went through the initial setup process did I realize that it was in fact a BB 8530!Bottom Line: Fortunately, Amazon fulfilled the order and gave me an instant refund. If I had bought it from the 3rd party vendor directly, I am sure that the return process would have been much more difficult.  This is the first time in 14 years that I have received the wrong product from Amazon.
